root: ^Thou shouldst not int'rf're with the business yond doest not incl….udeth thee.  If thou truly insist, thee'll has't to payeth a price.

c-0: ^I requesteth a delicacy yond hast been absent from these halls f'r a month.  'mongst us th're is a hoard'r of shrimp.  I'll consid'r helping if 't be true thee can findeth and secureth his bounty
c-1: ^Bah.  This is simply how i speaketh.  I am sob'r, thee troglodyte
